languages.text: {n}Еретик, обессиленно опустив жуткое оружие, но удерживаясь на ногах, бросает полный отчаяния взгляд на Ульфара. Вокс-динамик хрипит:{/n} "В обители Истинных Богов нет ни времени, ни запрета. Что отразилось там, пребудет неизбывно. Я был, а значит — я вечен. Крик скверны будет звучать в ваших ушах..."

{n}The heretic, lowering his gruesome weapon in exhaustion but still standing, casts a desperate glance at Ulfar. The vox-speaker crackles:{/n} "In the abode of the True Gods, there is neither time nor prohibition. What is reflected there will endure forever. I was, and therefore I am eternal. Doomscream will resound in your ears..."
languages.original_text: {n}Еретик, обессиленно опустив жуткое оружие, но удерживаясь на ногах, бросает полный отчаяния взгляд на Ульфара. Вокс-динамик хрипит:{/n} "В обители Истинных Богов нет ни времени, ни запрета. Что отразилось там, пребудет неизбывно. Я был, а значит — я вечен. Крик скверны будет звучать в ваших ушах..."

traits.locale_text: {n}The heretic, collapsing to the ground with a crash, casts a desperate glance at Ulfar. The vox-speaker crackles:{/n} "In the abode of the True Gods, there is neither time nor prohibition. What is reflected there will endure forever. I was, and therefore I am eternal. Balescream will resound in your ears..."

{n}The heretic, lowering his gruesome weapon in exhaustion but still standing, casts a desperate glance at Ulfar. The vox-speaker crackles:{/n} "In the abode of the True Gods, there is neither time nor prohibition. What is reflected there will endure forever. I was, and therefore I am eternal. Doomscream will resound in your ears..."

{n}The heretic, collapsing to the ground with a crash, casts a desperate glance at Ulfar. The vox-speaker crackles:{/n} "In the abode of the True Gods, there is neither time nor prohibition. What is reflected there will endure forever. I was, and therefore I am eternal. Balescream will resound in your ears..."

{n}The heretic, lowering his gruesome weapon in exhaustion but still standing, casts a desperate glance at Ulfar. The vox-speaker crackles:{/n} "In the abode of the True Gods, there is neither time nor prohibition. What is reflected there will endure forever. I was, and therefore I am eternal. Doomscream will resound in your ears..."

{n}The heretic, lowering his gruesome weapon in exhaustion but still standing, casts a desperate glance at Ulfar. The vox-speaker crackles:{/n} "In the abode of the True Gods, there is neither time nor prohibition. What is reflected there will endure forever. I was, and therefore I am eternal. Doomscream will resound in your ears..."

languages.text: {n}地狱兽筋疲力竭地放下了手中的恐怖武器，绝望地看了乌尔法一眼，但依然没有倒下。它的音阵装置依然噼啪作响。{/n}“在真神的居所中，没有时间，也没有禁令。那里所存在过的一切，都将永远存在。我曾存在过，因此我也将永存不朽。灾啸的咆哮声，将永远回荡在你的耳边……”
languages.original_text: {n}The heretic, lowering his gruesome weapon in exhaustion but still standing, casts a desperate glance at Ulfar. The vox-speaker crackles:{/n} "In the abode of the True Gods, there is neither time nor prohibition. What is reflected there will endure forever. I was, and therefore I am eternal. Doomscream will resound in your ears..."

traits.locale_text: {n}地狱兽轰然倒地，绝望地看着乌尔法。它的音阵装置依然噼啪作响。{/n}“在真神的居所中，没有时间，也没有禁令。那里所存在过的一切，都将永远存在。我曾存在过，因此我也将永存不朽。灾痛的尖叫声，将永远回荡在你的耳边……”

languages.text: {n}疲れ果てながら武器を下ろしつつも、未だ倒れてはいない異端者は、必死の眼差しでウルファーを見つめる。異端者のヴォクス・スピーカーがパチパチ音を立てる。{/n}「真の神のすみかでは、時間もなければ禁制もない。そこに映るものは永久に続く。俺は永遠だった、いや、俺は永遠となる。破滅の叫びがお前の耳に鳴り響くだろうよ…」
languages.original_text: {n}The heretic, lowering his gruesome weapon in exhaustion but still standing, casts a desperate glance at Ulfar. The vox-speaker crackles:{/n} "In the abode of the True Gods, there is neither time nor prohibition. What is reflected there will endure forever. I was, and therefore I am eternal. Doomscream will resound in your ears..."

traits.locale_text: {n}異端者は衝撃と共に地に倒れ、必死の眼差しでウルファーを見つめる。異端者のヴォクス・スピーカーがパチパチ音を立てる。{/n}「真の神のすみかでは、時間もなければ禁制もない。そこに映るものは永久に続く。俺は永遠だった、いや、俺は永遠となる。ベイルスクリームがお前の耳に鳴り響くだろうよ…」

languages.text: {n}El hereje, agotado, baja su truculenta arma y lanza una mirada desesperada a Ulfar. El altavoz del voco crepita:{/n} «En la casa de los Dioses Verdaderos, no existe el tiempo ni la prohibición. Lo que allí se refleja perdurará para siempre. Fui, luego soy, eterno. Doomscream resonará en vuestros oídos...».
languages.original_text: {n}The heretic, lowering his gruesome weapon in exhaustion but still standing, casts a desperate glance at Ulfar. The vox-speaker crackles:{/n} "In the abode of the True Gods, there is neither time nor prohibition. What is reflected there will endure forever. I was, and therefore I am eternal. Doomscream will resound in your ears..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hereje, cayendo al suelo estrepitosamente, lanza una mirada desesperada a Ulfar. El altavoz del voco crepita:{/n} «En la casa de los Dioses Verdaderos, no existe el tiempo ni la prohibición. Lo que allí se refleja perdurará para siempre. Fui, luego soy, eterno. Balescream resonará en vuestros oídos...».

languages.text: {n}À bout de forces, mais toujours debout, l'hérétique abaisse son arme effroyable et jette un regard désespéré à Ulfar tandis que son synthétiseur-vox crache en crépitant :{/n} « Le temps et les interdits n'ont pas cours dans la demeure des vrais dieux. Ce qui s'y produit perdure à jamais. J'étais et je demeure éternel. Le Fléau Hurlant résonnera à vos oreilles... »
languages.original_text: {n}The heretic, lowering his gruesome weapon in exhaustion but still standing, casts a desperate glance at Ulfar. The vox-speaker crackles:{/n} "In the abode of the True Gods, there is neither time nor prohibition. What is reflected there will endure forever. I was, and therefore I am eternal. Doomscream will resound in your ears..."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'hérétique s'effondre avec fracas et lance un regard désespéré à Ulfar tandis que son haut-parleur crache en crépitant :{/n} « Le temps et les interdits n'ont pas cours dans la demeure des vrais dieux. Ce qui s'y produit perdure à jamais. J'étais et je demeure éternel. Le Fléau Hurlant résonnera à vos oreilles... »

languages.text: {n}Der Ketzer lässt erschöpft seine grauenhafte Waffe sinken, bleibt jedoch stehen und blickt verzweifelt zu Ulfar. Der Vox-Lautsprecher knistert:{/n} "Im Haus der Wahren Götter gibt es weder Zeit noch Verbote. Was dort reflektiert wird, wird ewiglich überdauern. Ich war, und daher bin ich ewig. Unheilsschrei wird in Euren Ohren dröhnen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The heretic, lowering his gruesome weapon in exhaustion but still standing, casts a desperate glance at Ulfar. The vox-speaker crackles:{/n} "In the abode of the True Gods, there is neither time nor prohibition. What is reflected there will endure forever. I was, and therefore I am eternal. Doomscream will resound in your ears..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Ketzer stürzt mit lautem Getöse zu Boden und wirft Ulfar einen verzweifelten Blick zu. Aus dem Vox-Lautsprecher ertönt:{/n} "In der Heimstatt der wahren Götter gibt es weder Zeit noch Verbote. Was sich dort widerspiegelt, währt ewig. Ich war und darum bin ich ewig. Unheilsschrei wird in Euren Ohren widerhallen ..."

languages.text: {n}Dehşet verici silahını yorulup indirse de dimdik duran kâfir, Ulfar'a çaresizce bir bakış atıyor. Voks hoparlörü cızırdıyor:{/n} "Gerçek Tanrıların meskeninde zaman ve yasak yoktur. Orada görülen şeyler sonsuza uzanır. Ebedîydim, öyleyse ebedîyim. Belanarası kulaklarınızda yankılanacak..."
languages.original_text: {n}The heretic, lowering his gruesome weapon in exhaustion but still standing, casts a desperate glance at Ulfar. The vox-speaker crackles:{/n} "In the abode of the True Gods, there is neither time nor prohibition. What is reflected there will endure forever. I was, and therefore I am eternal. Doomscream will resound in your ears..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dehşet verici silahını yorulup indirse de dimdik duran kâfir, Ulfar'a çaresizce bir bakış atıyor. Voks hoparlörü cızırdıyor:{/n} "Gerçek Tanrıların meskeninde zaman ve yasak yoktur. Orada görülen şeyler sonsuza uzanır. Ebedîydim, öyleyse ebedîyim. Belanarası kulaklarınızda yankılanacak..."
